mapper.update: update v_uesr set v_password=#{password},v_salt=#{salt} where v_userId=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT vu.v_username,vu.v_mail,vu.v_phone,vu.v_headPath,vu.v_grade,vu.v_sex,v_orderId, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM v_order WHERE v_statusId=1 AND v_orderId=o1.v_orderId) s1, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM v_order WHERE v_statusId=2 AND v_orderId=o1.v_orderId) s2, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM v_order WHERE v_statusId=3 AND v_orderId=o1.v_orderId) s3 FROM v_order o1,v_uesr vu WHERE vu.v_userId=o1.v_userId AND vu.v_userId=#{userId}
